com.facebook.rendercore

Class RenderUnit<MOUNT_CONTENT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.rendercore.RenderUnit<MOUNT_CONTENT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LithoRenderUnit

    public abstract class RenderUnit<MOUNT_CONTENT>
extends Object
implements Copyable
    A RenderUnit represents a single rendering primitive for RenderCore. Every RenderUnit has to define at least a createContent method to allocate the RenderUnit content (View or Drawable). RenderUnits will be automatically recycled by RenderCore based on their concrete type. A RenderUnit should in most cases declare how it intends to bind data returning Binders from its mountUnmountFunctions callback or from the attachDetachFunctions callback.

      • mountUnmountFunctions

        public final List<RenderUnit.Binder<RenderUnit<MOUNT_CONTENT>,MOUNT_CONTENT>> mountUnmountFunctions()
        Returns:
        a list of binding functions that will be invoked during the mount process.

      • attachDetachFunctions

        public final List<RenderUnit.Binder<RenderUnit<MOUNT_CONTENT>,MOUNT_CONTENT>> attachDetachFunctions()
        Returns:
        a list of binding functions that will be invoked whenever the shouldUpdate method in them returns true or the RenderUnit gets attached/detached from the hierarchy. If both shouldUpdate returns true and this RenderUnit was attached the bind function will still be guaranteed to be called once.

      • getId

        public abstract long getId()
        Returns:
        a unique id identifying this RenderUnit in the tree of Node it is part of.

      • getRenderContentType

        public Object getRenderContentType()

      • measure

        public MeasureResult measure(RenderState.LayoutContext context,
                             int widthSpec,
                             int heightSpec)
        RenderUnits that can measure their content should implement this method and return a MeasureResult with the bounds of their content. Measure is guaranteed to be called at least once before this RenderUnit is mounted.

      • makeCopy

        public RenderUnit makeCopy()
        Specified by:
        makeCopy in interface Copyable

      • addMountUnmountExtension

        public void addMountUnmountExtension(RenderUnit.Binder binder)
        Adds an extension function that will be invoked with the other mount/unmount binders. Can be used to add generic functionality (e.g. accessibility) to a RenderUnit.

      • removeMountUnmountExtension

        public void removeMountUnmountExtension(RenderUnit.Binder binder)
        removes an extension function previously added with addMountUnmountExtension
